1.name: Abomination
1.description: This Tanky mass of flesh and steel will Hook ranged enemies, drawing them into his Cleave attack.

1.name: Noxius Presence
1.description: Poison nearby enemies every 3 seconds.

2.name: Cannonball
2.description: On deploy and at 50 % health, stun nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

3.name: Fresh Meat
3.description: After hooking a target, deal double damage on the next attack.

2.name: Angry Chickens
2.description: A flock of feathered fowl that can overwhelm even the heartiest of Tanks and Towers.

1.name: Snackrifice
1.description: Nearby Beast allies can consume a Chicken to heal themselves.

2.name: Walking Crate
2.description: Deploy in a protective crate. When destroyed, Chickens emerge.

3.name: Furious Fowl
3.description: Gain Fury.

3.name: Arcane Blast
3.description: This spell surges with power! Each extra tap increases Gold cost by 1 and doubles the Elemental damage!

1.name: Amplification
1.description: Sequential taps increase radius by 1.

2.name: Arcane Power
2.description: Spell sequence starts at rank 3 and ends at rank 4.

3.name: Torrent
3.description: Gain a level after casting Rank 4.

4.name: Banshee
4.description: Shrieks in delight at nearby enemies, Possessing the first she sees to fight for you, permanently.

1.name: Soul Eruption
1.description: Possessed targets detonate on death, damaging nearby enemies.

2.name: Unholy Frenzy
2.description: Possessed targets gain Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

3.name: Will of the Necropolis
3.description: Fully Heal the possessed target.

1.name: Death Pact
1.description: Periodically sacrifice a nearby Skeleton to be Healed.

2.name: Skeletal Frenzy
2.description: Nearby allied Skeletons gain Bloodlust.

3.name: Chill Of The Grave
3.description: Summon Skeletal Mages instead of Warriors.

6.name: Bat Rider
6.description: A cheap aerial unit that specializes in bathing the ground in flame while Flying above Melee enemies.

1.name: Flaming Pitch
1.description: Flaming pool reduces enemy's speed by 30%.

2.name: Enchanted Vials
2.description: Increase the size of the flaming pool by 30%.

3.name: Fiery Surplus
3.description: "Accidentally" leave vials on the ground, Burning nearby enemies that touch them.

7.name: Blizzard
7.description: Rain down Frost shards from the sky! Slows and deals Elemental damage to all enemies in a large area.

1.name: Cold Snap
1.description: Freeze enemy troops in place.

2.name: Brittle Ice
2.description: Enemies within take 30% additional damage from Physical sources.

3.name: Icecrown
3.description: Summons an additional Blizzard at your Base.

8.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
8.description: Blood magic is thicker than water magic.

1.name: Drain Life
1.description: Gain Lifesteal.

2.name: Bane
2.description: Playing a spell increases attack speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

3.name: Dominance
3.description: Spells costing 4 or more grant an additional level.

1.name: Reincarnation
1.description: After death, Resurrect at 50% Health once.

2.name: Plainsrunning
2.description: Move 50% faster and gain the Fast trait.

3.name: Aftershock
3.description: When Stun expires, affected enemies are Dazed for 5 seconds.

10.name: Chain Lightning
10.description: Swarmed by Squads of smaller foes? Send a surge of lightning sizzling through several enemies!

1.name: Brilliant Flash
1.description: On deploy, Stun enemies within for 1 second.

2.name: Reverberation
2.description: Can be cast a second time.

3.name: Storm's Reach
3.description: Dramatically increase jump distance between targets.

11.name: Charlga Razorflank
11.description: Your Minis in hand share the same cost. What???

1.name: Spirit Passage
1.description: Minis played for 5 Gold gain a level and deploy in Stealth.

2.name: Cavernous Mists
2.description: Deploy cost reduced by 1.

3.name: Nature's Grasp
3.description: Root two additional nearby targets, but deal half damage.

12.name: Cheat Death
12.description: Imbue your minions with one last breath of death, preventing them from dying for a precious few seconds.

1.name: Vampirism
1.description: Affected minis are Healed when dealing damage.

2.name: Apocalypse
2.description: Affected Skeletons Resurrect at your base when they die.

3.name: Seal Fate
3.description: Affected minis gain Bloodlust, but die when the effect ends.

13.name: Core Hounds
13.description: This pair of Resistant Tanks is only dead when both are snuffed out. When one falls, the other rekindles it!

1.name: Eternal Bond
1.description: Resurrection range is unlimited.

2.name: Guard Dog
2.description: Deal 50% additional damage near friendly towers and meeting stones.

3.name: Fiery Rebirth
3.description: On Resurrection, damage nearby enemies.

14.name: Dark Iron Miner
14.description: When there's more Gold than your Kobold can mine, hire another to mine behind enemy lines!

1.name: Gold Mine
1.description: After Mining, drop a proximity mine. Damages nearby enemies when touched.

2.name: Dark Iron Armaments
2.description: After Mining, gain Armored.

3.name: Dwarven Ambition
3.description: Gain Fury.

15.name: Darkspear Troll
15.description: This headhunter deals massive damage with savage spear throws. Enemies in the air beware!

1.name: Big Bad Voodoo
1.description: Regenerate 20% health every second.

2.name: Headhunting
2.description: On kill, increase Attack and Movement speed by 10%. Stacks to 50%.

3.name: Serpent Sting
3.description: Gain Poison.

16.name: Deep Breath
16.description: Strike with dragon's breath in any direction, dealing Elemental damage to enemies in the line of fire!

1.name: Attunement
1.description: Allies caught in the effect gain Resist.

2.name: Melting Point
2.description: Damaging Armored enemies removes their Armor.

3.name: Double Dragon
3.description: Cast a second wave in the opposite direction.

17.name: Defias Bandits
17.description: Stealthy and weak on their own, but will sneak up and Stun enemies while your damage dealers open fire!

1.name: Pick Lock
1.description: Earn an extra +2 Gold when opening chests.

2.name: Deadly Poison
2.description: Gain Poison.

3.name: Last Resort
3.description: On death, Stun the target for 3 seconds.

18.name: Drake
18.description: Flies over the battlefield with flaming breath, incinerating Flying and Ground enemies alike.

1.name: Mother Drake
1.description: Periodically summon a Whelp Egg.

2.name: Engulfing Flames
2.description: Damaging enemies Burns them.

3.name: Roost
3.description: Perch on top of a nearby tower, staying there to defend it.

19.name: Earth Elemental
19.description: Drop this heavily Armored avalanche anywhere to Tank for your troops. Only punches Towers and Bosses.

1.name: Obsidian Shard
1.description: On death, split into two smaller Earth Elementals.

2.name: Ready to Rumble
2.description: Taunt on deploy.

3.name: Shrapnel Blast
3.description: Destroying a tower deals damage to nearby enemies.

20.name: Execute
20.description: Savagely slice through enemies, chopping off half of their maximum Health in one swipe.

1.name: Bloodthirsty
1.description: Bloodlust allies within spell area for 10 seconds.

2.name: Overpower
2.description: Knock enemies away from the cast location.

3.name: Killing Spree
3.description: If an enemy is killed, the next Horde mini costs 1 less.

21.name: Fire Elemental
21.description: Resistant to Elemental damage. Specializes in Cleaving through Armored enemies.

1.name: Immolation Aura
1.description: Periodically damage nearby enemies.

2.name: Molten Core
2.description: On death, summon a pool of lava, damaging enemies within.

3.name: Fan The Flames
3.description: Taking Elemental damage increases damage dealt by 10%. Stacks to 30%.

22.name: Firehammer
22.description: Furiously flings fiery hammers at foes. Starts slow, but her Armor melting momentum can't be matched.

1.name: Moultin' Metal
1.description: Deal 50% more damage to Flying enemies.

2.name: Blazing Speed
2.description: Fury builds up to 40% higher.

3.name: Heightened Rage
3.description: Level up upon reaching full Fury.

23.name: Flamewaker
23.description: Ignites the ground with waves of flame, incinerating supporting troops behind enemy Tanks.

1.name: Backdraft
1.description: Successive attacks increase flame wave distance. Resets on movement.

2.name: Engulf
2.description: Damaging enemies Burns thems.

3.name: Heat Stroke
3.description: Damaging enemies Dazes them.

24.name: Footmen
24.description: An Armored phalanx Squad of steel, a great Tank for fragile allies, and can be split to defend two lanes at once!

1.name: Fortification
1.description: Gain 30% extra empty Health.

2.name: Shield Bash
2.description: Periodically Stun the target for 1 second.

3.name: Last Stand
3.description: Armor increases to 75% damage reduction when no other Footmen are nearby.

25.name: Frostwolf Shaman
25.description: Why choose between Ranged damage and Healing when you can have both? Elemental mastery to heal and harm!

1.name: Earth Shield
1.description: Grant Armored to a nearby ally. Ability has 1 charge.

2.name: Lightning Mastery
2.description: Ranged attack chains to 3 nearby targets.

3.name: Earthwall Totem
3.description: Once per deploy, place a totem that partially heals a nearby tower or base.

26.name: Gargoyle
26.description: A Flying fortress of Armor. This single-minded Tank attacks buildings and bosses, ignoring all other distractions.

1.name: Wing Buffet
1.description: ncreases move speed by 33%.

2.name: Aerial Superiority
2.description: Incoming damage from Flying minis is reduced by 50%.

3.name: Obsidian Statue
3.description: On death, summon a statue with Taunt. Lasts until destroyed.

1.name: Chromatic Scales
1.description: Grants nearby allies the Resistant trait.

2.name: Piercing Blows
2.description: Attacks pierce through enemies in a line.

3.name: Lasting Legacy
3.description: On death, drop a banner. Nearby enemies take 50% additional Elemental damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

28.name: Ghoul
28.description: A cheap but ravenous Tank, ready to feast on fallen enemies to replenish its Health.

1.name: Bone Shield
1.description: Cannibalizing grants Armored for 10 seconds.

2.name: Taste for Blood
2.description: Deal 50% additional damage to enemies who are below 50% health.

3.name: Ravenous
3.description: Cannibalizing grants Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

29.name: Gnoll Brute
29.description: A tough Tank with a menacing mace. Cleaves through Squads of enemies, or clobbers with collateral damage.

1.name: Rabid
1.description: Reduce deploy cost by 1 and gain the Cycle trait.

2.name: Pillage
2.description: Deal Siege damage.

3.name: Thick Hide
3.description: Gain Armor.

30.name: Goblin Sapper
30.description: Sappers sacrifice themselves to deliver superior Siege damage in seconds. Topple Towers with this tag team!

1.name: Rocket Powered Turbo Boots
1.description: Move twice as fast and gain the Fast trait.

2.name: Extra BOOM
2.description: Deploy an additional +1 Goblin Sapper.

3.name: Crude Gunpowder
3.description: On death, Burn nearby enemies.

1.name: Bladestorm
1.description: Gain an AOE bladespin ability that damages all nearby enemies.

2.name: Savage Strikes
2.description: Deal double damage to enemies who are below 50% health.

3.name: Mirror Image
3.description: Summon two fragile mirror images when entering combat.

32.name: Gryphon Rider
32.description: A sky-riding Flier that throws mighty dwarven hammers at aerial and ground troops alike.

1.name: Mighty Throw
1.description: Gain +3 Range.

2.name: Odyn's Fury
2.description: Gain Fury.

3.name: Air Drop
3.description: Periodically drop a potion, leveling up the first ally to touch it.

33.name: Harpies
33.description: A trio of fragile Fliers, but if they can reach their target, they will shred it in seconds.

1.name: Infectious Swipes
1.description: Gain Poison.

2.name: Trinket Collectors
2.description: Gain the Miner trait. Cost increased by 1.

3.name: Talon Dive
3.description: Deal double damage on the 1st attack.

34.name: Harvest Golem
34.description: A hearty Melee automaton with a trick up its sleeve - After its first death it will shock itself back to life!

1.name: Trojan Chickens
1.description: On death, spawn 4 Angry Chickens.

2.name: Unstable Core
2.description: On death, Stun nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

3.name: Bountiful Harvest
3.description: On death, apply a Heal over time effect to nearby allies.

35.name: Hogger
35.description: The legendary terror of Elwynn Forest. Mercilessly CLEAVES aspiring adventurers and rallies Gnoll Brutes to his cause.

1.name: Ham Hock
1.description: Hogger also gains +10% max health each time he is played.

2.name: Spoiled Meat
2.description: Gain Poison.

3.name: Fatal Frenzy
3.description: On death, Bloodlust nearby Beasts.

36.name: Holy Nova
36.description: Bathe friend and foe in holy light, Healing allies and damaging enemies to turn the tide of battle!

1.name: Inner Fire
1.description: Affected allies gain Armored and Resist for 5 seconds.

2.name: Amplify Magic
2.description: Effects are doubled on all Elemental minis.

3.name: Renew
3.description: Also adds a heal over time to allies.

37.name: Huntress
37.description: A Fast and lethal Ranged rider. Her glaives slice through Squads, bouncing from foe to foe.

1.name: Elven Might
1.description: Deal 50% additional damage to the initial target.

2.name: Shadowmeld
2.description: Gain Stealth and Ambush.

3.name: Darnassian Steel
3.description: Glaive bounces an additional 3 times.

1.name: Clearcasting
1.description: Spells cost 1 less (but no less than 1) if played immediately after Jaina.

2.name: Flurry
2.description: Frostbolts burst on impact, Frosting enemies near the target.

3.name: Blink
3.description: Periodically teleport away from attackers.

39.name: Living Bomb
39.description: Plant a bomb on a group of enemies that all blow up for excessive collateral damage. The more the flamier!

1.name: Chain Reaction
1.description: Splash damage inflicts Living Bomb.

2.name: Blast Radius
2.description: Also burn enemies within 10 units.

3.name: Burden Of Fate
3.description: Affected enemies are Dazed.

40.name: Maiev Shadowsong
40.description: Wield the shadows and strike like the wind.

1.name: Remorseless
1.description: Deal double damage for 2 seconds after killing an enemy.

2.name: Enveloping Shadows
2.description: Cast Smoke Bomb on deploy, Stealthing nearby allies.

3.name: Shadowstep
3.description: eriodically teleport to a ranged attacker when hit.

41.name: Meat Wagon
41.description: Sieges enemies with slabs of meat. Bombards from so far away that it outranges Towers!

1.name: Filet Trebuchet
1.description: Increase Bombard range by +2.

2.name: Meat And Bones
2.description: Every other attack summons a Skeleton instead of dealing damage.

3.name: Greased Gears
3.description: Gain Fury.

42.name: Molten Giant
42.description: A wall of Armored obsidian. Slow and lumbering but devastating to Towers. The ultimate Melee Tank.

1.name: Bolster
1.description: Heal when destroying a tower.

2.name: Threatening Presence
2.description: Gain Taunt.

3.name: Blood Of The Mountain
3.description: On death, explode, damaging nearby enemies.

43.name: Mountaineer
43.description: This inseparable Tank and Ranged pair cover each other for an instantly effective offensive!

1.name: Mend Pets
1.description: Heal up to 3 additional nearby Beasts when healing the Bear.

2.name: Intimidation
2.description: Bear gains Taunt.

3.name: Frenzied Spirit
3.description: When the Bear or Mountaineer die, the other gains Bloodlust.

44.name: Murloc Tidehunters
44.description: Fast and cheap, great for supporting Tanks and taking Treasure Chests, but weak on their own.

1.name: Safety Bubble
1.description: Deploy with a bubble that blocks the first attack.

2.name: Morelocs
2.description: Deploy with +1 additional Murloc.

3.name: Careful Aim
3.description: Gain +2 range.

45.name: Necromancer
45.description: Endlessly summons Skeletons for protection while piercing through Armor with Elemental shadow bolts.

1.name: Jeweled Skulls
1.description: Summon Skeletal Mages instead of Skeletons.

2.name: Cult of the Damned
2.description: On kill, summon a Skeleton.

3.name: Breath of the Dying
3.description: On death, summon 5 Skeletons.

46.name: Ogre Mage
46.description: Hurling fireballs is always brutal, but this Magi also buffs nearby allies with Bloodlust. More bang for your buck!

1.name: Avarice
1.description: Gain Bloodlust when Bloodlusting an ally.

2.name: Frostfire Bolt
2.description: Gain Frost.

3.name: Ignite
3.description: Burn enemy targets.

47.name: Old Murk-Eye
47.description: This seasoned Murloc has (and hasn't) seen plenty of battles. If you can shell out the Gold, his entourage of Tidehunters is shore to make waves on the battlefield.

1.name: Marathon Of The Murlocs
1.description: March of the Murlocs lasts an additional 5 seconds longer after deploying.

2.name: Electric Eels
2.description: Attacks briefly Stun enemies.

3.name: Tip of the Spear
3.description: Tidehunters spawn at Old Murk Eye's location instead.

48.name: Plague Farmer
48.description: Bombards enemy ground troops with Poisonous pumpkins. Keep him alive and watch enemies rot!

1.name: Splashing Pumpkins
1.description: Increase Range by +1 and double the Splash area.

2.name: Parting Gift
2.description: On death, summon a pumpkin. When touched, it Poisons nearby enemies.

3.name: Virulence
3.description: On kill, Poison enemies near the target.

49.name: Polymorph
49.description: Morphs your foes into fluffy yet feeble sheep, stripping them of their defenses and making them Vulnerable for a precious few seconds!

1.name: Golden Fleece
1.description: One sheep becomes golden. Killing it grants +1 gold.

2.name: Exploding Sheep
2.description: Killing a sheep damages nearby enemies.

3.name: Stable Transfiguration
3.description: Lasts twice as long, but sheep regenerate health very quickly.

50.name: Prowler
50.description: A Fast and ferocious Melee Tank. Sprints ahead to protect slower troops, or defend a far away fight.

1.name: On The Prowl
1.description: Gain Stealth, and stun the target when attacking from Stealth.

2.name: Pack Leader
2.description: Grants nearby Beast allies 30% additional damage.

3.name: Predatory Instincts
3.description: Deal double damage to enemies who are at more than 75% health.

51.name: Pyromancer
51.description: Sometimes you need to light an enemy on fire. She prefers to light them all on fire.

1.name: Conflagrate
1.description: Splash area is doubled.

2.name: Pyroblast
2.description: Deal triple damage on the first attack.

3.name: Blaze of Glory
3.description: Damage and Burn nearby enemies on death.

52.name: Quilboar
52.description: Surprise your enemies with this Unbound Melee burrower! Slow to emerge but bristling for a fight.

1.name: Tunnel Vision
1.description: Deploy much more quickly.

2.name: Bristleback
2.description: Deal a small amount of damage to Melee attackers.

3.name: Bramble Burst
3.description: Inflict Poison on nearby enemies when emerging.

53.name: Raptors
53.description: Fast savage slashers! Each extra tap increases Gold cost by 1 and deploys an additional Raptor.

1.name: Strength In Numbers
1.description: Deal 10% more damage for each other Raptor nearby.

2.name: Fast Food
2.description: On kill, heal a small amount of damage.

3.name: Motivation
3.description: Gain Bloodlust while a chest or gold vein is nearby.

54.name: Rend Blackhand
54.description: Riding dragons before it was coool.

1.name: Scale and Steel
1.description: Gain Resistant while flying and Armored while dismounted.

2.name: Flaming Soul
2.description: Cast Living Bomb upon dismounting, damaging nearby enemies.

3.name: Legionnaire
3.description: Dismount when first taking damage. The Drake continues fighting.

55.name: S.A.F.E. Pilot
55.description: A flexible Ranged unit. Crash her into enemies or land her behind your Tanks for Area Damage support.

1.name: Gnomish Cloaking Device
1.description: Deploy from the explosion with Stealth and Ambush.

2.name: Comin' In Hot!
2.description: Deploy twice as fast and Burn nearby enemies.

3.name: Gnomish Muttonizer
3.description: Polymorph the first blaster target.

56.name: Skeleton Party
56.description: A Frosty surprise for any location! Raise a Squad of Ranged and Melee Skeletons to assist with any skirmish.

1.name: 5-Man
1.description: Summons a Skeleton Tank, Rogue, Priest, and 2 Mages.

2.name: Corpse Run
2.description: Gain +1 level for each deploy after the first. (Maximum +3 levels)

3.name: Ritual of Rime
3.description: Summon 5 Skeleton Mages who guard the deploy location.

57.name: Skeletons
57.description: These Skeletons can arise anywhere on the map to distract enemies or claim a remote resource.

1.name: Questing Buddies
1.description: One Skeleton gains Armor, one gains Resist, and one gains Stealth.

2.name: Exhume
2.description: If deployed near a Tower or Meeting Stone, deploy +2 additional Skeletons.

3.name: Cackle
3.description: Gain Taunt.

58.name: Smoke Bomb
58.description: Get the drop on your enemies by granting Stealth to nearby allies. Use in a skirmish to confuse the enemy!

1.name: Through The Shadows
1.description: Affected minis move 50% faster until unstealthed.

2.name: Band Of Thieves
2.description: Grant +2 levels to Cycle minis within.

3.name: Strangers in the Night
3.description: Effects apply to enemies as well.

59.name: Sneed
59.description: When you are a buzzsaw, all your problems look like trees.

1.name: Lead With Greed
1.description: Gain an additional +2 Gold when Sneed triggers Sneed Before Greed.

2.name: Mine Is Money, Friend!
2.description: Gain the Miner trait.

3.name: Land Grab
3.description: Gain a level whenever Sneed Before Greed.

60.name: Spiderlings
60.description: A Squad of Poisonous predators. Their venom will pierce Armor and down even the mightiest of Tanks.

1.name: Frostbite
1.description: Gain Frost.

2.name: Bloated Carapace
2.description: Explode on death, Poisoning nearby enemies.

3.name: Envenom
3.description: Deal twice as much Poison damage.

61.name: Stonehoof Tauren
61.description: An exceptionally beefy bruiser that will Charge into battle, and even Charge while she's in battle!

1.name: Momentum
1.description: After connecting a charge, immediately charge a second time if possible.

2.name: Pummel
2.description: After connecting a charge, Stun the target for 3 seconds.

3.name: Provoke
3.description: After connecting a charge, Taunt nearby enemies.

62.name: Sylvannas Windrunner
62.description: Sylvanas attacks with unrelenting arrow shots, and releases a Banshee when she dies.

1.name: Black Arrow
1.description: Pierce through enemies in a line, dealing Elemental damage.

2.name: Banshee's Wail
2.description: Scream on Death, Stunning nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

3.name: Forsaken Fury
3.description: Nearby Horde and Undead Minis gain Fury.

63.name: Tirion Fordring
63.description: A hammer of CLEAVING , a hand of HEALING , and ARMOR of believing. What more do you need?

1.name: Divine Shield
1.description: Gain a magical shield at 30% health, absorbing all damage for 5 seconds.

2.name: By The Light
2.description: Heal the primary target for twice as much.

3.name: Consecrate
3.description: Regularly consecrate the ground, damaging enemies within.

64.name: Vultures
64.description: A cheap pair of Flying scavengers. Two vultures are a nuisance, but each vulture victim adds to the flock!

1.name: Feeding Frenzy
1.description: The flock gains Bloodlust for 5 seconds when spawning a new Vulture.

2.name: Migration
2.description: All additional Vultures spawn at your base.

3.name: Tendon Rip
3.description: Attacks Daze enemies for 3 seconds.

65.name: Warsong Grunts
65.description: While slow and steady at the start, this Squad of fighters will speed up, Furiously slashing at frightened foes.

1.name: Command
1.description: Nearby Beast allies deal 30% additional damage.

2.name: Blood Pact
2.description: When a Grunt dies, the other gain Bloodlust.

3.name: Guard Duty
3.description: Remain at deploy location until entering combat.

66.name: Warsong Raider
66.description: This Fast rider smashes Towers with savage sustained Siege damage. Clear a path and she'll clear the rest.

1.name: Razing Focus
1.description: Become a Siege unit, ignoring enemy Minis.

2.name: Sunder Armor
2.description: Damaging an Armored enemy removes their Armor.

3.name: Saboteur
3.description: Damaging a tower reduces its damage dealt by 50% for 3 seconds.

67.name: Whelp Eggs
67.description: Drop these eggs anywhere on the battlefield to surprise Melee enemies with many fiery Flying whelps!

1.name: Flame Burst
1.description: Damage nearby enemies when hatching.

2.name: Rookery
2.description: When one egg hatches, the others hatch immediately.

3.name: Chromatic Plating
3.description: Eggs gain Taunt.

68.name: Worgen
68.description: This Stealthy predator assassinates annoying Ranged units. Play him anywhere and tear their support apart!

1.name: Premeditation
1.description: Increase Ambush damage by 50%.

2.name: Lone Wolf
2.description: On deploy, grant +1 gold if no allies are nearby.

3.name: Frenzy
3.description: On kill, gain Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

69.name: Chimaera
69.description: A Flying malefic monstrosity that rains down Poison and Lightning on multiple miniscule minions.

1.name: Leviathan
1.description: Gain 10% additional Health per deploy.

2.name: Frost Shock
2.description: Lightning Ball applies Frost on hit.

3.name: Fiery Rebirth
3.description: Poison Spit inflicts twice as much Poison.

70.name: Emperor Thaurissan
70.description: If Ragnaros was your boss, you'd be cranky too.

1.name: Moira's Wit
1.description: Nearby Burning enemies Heal Thaurissan.

2.name: Hubris
2.description: After playing Thaurissan, your next non-Elemental Mini deploys with +2 levels.

3.name: Incinerate
3.description: Lava Spike's Burn is permanent.

71.name: Witch Doctor
71.description: A Cycle support caster. Channels an explosive Curse on an enemy, helping allies take out multiple foes!

1.name: Alchemist
1.description: Periodically drop a potion, granting Bloodlust to the first ally who touches it.

2.name: Amplify Curse
2.description: Enemies killed by the Curse explosion also explode.

3.name: Spirit Ward
3.description: On kill, grant a shield to nearby allies, absorbing the next hit against them.

72.name: Faerie Dragon
72.description: This flying trickster can see through Stealth, and shakes off Poison, Burn, Stuns, and Slows!

1.name: Phase Shift
1.description: Teleport backwards when attacked.

2.name: Invisibility
2.description: Gain Stealth.

3.name: Fae Blessing
3.description: Once per deploy, grant Resist to a nearby Ally.
